00023    EnergyEnsemble::EnergyEnsemble(Type type)
00024     : temperature_(1.0),
00025       beta_(1.0),
00026       type_(type)
00027    {}
00028 
00032    void  EnergyEnsemble::setTemperature(double temperature)
00033    {
00034       if (!isIsothermal()) {
00035     UTIL_THROW("Must be an isothermal ensemble");
00036       }
00037       temperature_ = temperature;
00038       beta_        = 1.0/temperature;
00039    }
00040 
00044    void EnergyEnsemble::readParam(std::istream& in)
00045    {
00046       readBegin(in, "EnergyEnsemble");
00047       read<Type>(in, "type", type_);
00048       if (isIsothermal()) {
00049          read<double>(in, "temperature", temperature_);
00050          beta_ = 1.0/temperature_;
00051       }
00052       readEnd(in);
00053    }
00054 
00055    /*
00056    * Extract an EnergyEnsemble::Type from an istream as a string.
00057    */
00058    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, EnergyEnsemble::Type &type)
00059    {
00060       std::string buffer;
00061       in >> buffer;
00062       if (buffer == "ADIABATIC" || buffer == "adiabatic") {
00063          type = EnergyEnsemble::ADIABATIC;
00064       } else
00065       if (buffer == "ISOTHERMAL" || buffer == "isothermal") {
00066          type = EnergyEnsemble::ISOTHERMAL;
00067       } else {
00068          UTIL_THROW("Invalid EnergyEnsemble::Type value input");
00069       }
00070       return in;
00071    }
00072 
00073    /*
00074    * Insert a EnergyEnsemble::Type to an ostream as a string.
00075    */
00076    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const EnergyEnsemble::Type &type)
00077    {
00078       if (type == EnergyEnsemble::ADIABATIC) {
00079          out << "adiabatic";
00080       } else
00081       if (type == EnergyEnsemble::ISOTHERMAL) {
00082          out << "isothermal";
00083       }
00084       return out;
00085    }

00091    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<EnergyEnsemble>::type = MPI::BYTE;
00092    bool MpiTraits<EnergyEnsemble>::hasType = false;
00093 
00097    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<EnergyEnsemble::Type>::type = MPI::INT;
00098    bool MpiTraits<EnergyEnsemble::Type>::hasType = true;
00099 
00103    void EnergyEnsemble::commitMpiType()
00104    {
00105       MpiStructBuilder builder;
00106       EnergyEnsemble   object;
00107 
00108       builder.setBase(&object);
00109       builder.addMember(&object.temperature_, MPI::DOUBLE);
00110       builder.addMember(&object.beta_, MPI::DOUBLE);
00111       builder.addMember(&object.type_, MPI::INT);
00112       builder.commit(MpiTraits<EnergyEnsemble>::type);
00113       MpiTraits<EnergyEnsemble>::hasType = true;
00114    }
00115    #endif
00116 
00117 }
00118 #endif
